details.description: Plan your route, find out departure and arrival times, check live traffic news and more
details.more_information:
You can also find:

  • car parks and stations near the place you’re visiting
  • maps of the local area
details.introduction: You can plan your journey by public transport or car using postcodes, places, addresses or major attractions. You can choose the types of transport you want to use and the dates and times of your journey.

tags.title: Blue Badge, parking, local travel and the environment

details.description: Information about parking permits, fines and wheel clamping

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Transport on trains, planes, cars, taxis and minicabs, buses, coaches and wheelchairs for disabled people - Freedom Pass, Disabled Person's Railcard, concessionary bus pass and Shopmobility
